section3.title: Trade In Your Device and Save on a New One
section3.content: If you’re in the market for a new device, our certified pre-owned devices are the most economical solution especially when compared to financing a device alongside a plan through a carrier. Not only can you trade in your used devices no matter what the condition for credit towards a brand new device, or even the cost of a repair. Our pricing is always competitive to Rogers or Bell’s trade-in prices and while they may give you credit towards a bill, we can offer you either cash or credit towards the cost of anything in store. In addition, the remaining balance can be financed as low as 0%, which is

section4.title: Buy a New or Used Device with our 12 Month Warranty
section4.content: All the mobile devices we sell are function tested for all 60 essential functions and graded for aesthetic condition. All devices are backed by a 12 month warranty which covers any defects or functionality fails, not physical or liquid damage. Your IMEI is fully guaranteed and you will absolutely not run into any blacklist or cellular connectivity issues worldwide. Our aim is to make buying a certified pre-owned device as seamless, painless and ultimately enjoyable as it should be. No more greasy Kijiji sales, no more sketchy Facebook meetups - get the best price, best devices and best service with Mobile Tech Lab’s devices.

section5.title: See Why Customers Love Mobile Tech Lab

reviews.content: Just want you to know how pleased I am with your service. The new battery is working perfectly. Your communication throughout the process was timely and professional and helpful. The reassembly of the pixel is flawless. I can't see any evidence that the phone shell is not the original. Am glad to have come across your business. Won't hesitate to recommend you to friends. Allan Lauder

Excellent service! We were very impressed with the caliber of repair on my son’s iPhone. We had the screen and battery replaced, at a reasonable price. The customer service was great. Highly recommend if you are in the unfortunate position of needing a repair.

Came to them with a cracked iPhone back. The team was engaging, kept me updated, explained everything and Best of all they were the best priced repair place in Winnipeg (I called around to them all) and fixed it same day! I will be recommending them to everyone I know.
